Chapter 2958: Chapter 2958-

Today, night rose had changed her clothes and was even more alluring.

What happened next was completely beyond Lu Ming’s expectations. The night rose actually used all means to seduce Lu Ming, as if they wanted to rape him on the spot. Fortunately, Lu Ming was mentally strong and managed to resist the temptation.

That was because Lu Ming instinctively felt a deep sense of danger from the night rose.

This sense of danger caused his mind to tremble.

Lu Ming felt that the night rose seemed to want to eat him.

Therefore, Lu Ming calmed down.

“Lu Ming, can you not leave tonight?”

After her actions were ineffective against Lu Ming, night rose spoke again. Even a fool could understand what she meant.

Any normal man would not be able to resist such temptation.

However, Lu Ming had completely calmed down. He felt that the sense of danger coming from the dark rose was getting stronger and stronger.

He had a feeling that if he couldn’t resist the temptation and really had sex with the night rose, he would probably die.

Lu Ming’s mind was spinning rapidly as he thought of a countermeasure.

Night Rose’s small hands were already moving around Lu Ming’s body.

Lu Ming reached out and grabbed the small hand of the night rose. He gritted his teeth and put on an expression as if he was resisting the temptation. miss qiangwei, Lu Ming has never experienced such a thing. Moreover, we don’t know much about it. It’s not very good to do such a thing!

what’s not good about it? you can slowly understand it in the future!

The night rose smiled faintly. Her breath was like orchids and a fragrance rushed into Lu Ming’s nose.

Lu Ming’s heart beat faster.

“No, there’s poison in this fragrance!”

Lu Ming was greatly shocked.

He finally sensed that there was poison in the fragrance. This poison could stimulate the burning desire in one’s body. It was no wonder that even with Lu Ming’s mental fortitude, he could not remain calm.

this night rose is indeed up to no good. Could it be that she’s cultivating some kind of evil technique that absorbs yang to supplement Yin? ”

Lu Ming’s mind was racing.

He guessed that night rose had cultivated some kind of evil art and had taken a fancy to his talent, so she wanted to use this evil art on him.

“Old Liang, I’ll leave it to you!”

Lu Ming sent a voice transmission to the quantity formula.

Immediately, the ” quantity ” formula emitted an attractive force and absorbed the poison. Lu Ming calmed down completely.

Lu Ming circulated his divine power and shook it slightly. He pushed the dark rose away and moved to a stone bench at the side.”Miss Rose, I’m a traditional person. Before I fully understand it, I will not have sex with any woman. Please forgive me!”

Lu Ming said, putting on the look of a gentleman.

“This fellow …”

Night rose secretly gritted her teeth and secretly despised him in her heart. She didn’t expect that he would still have such stubborn thoughts.

Forcing out a smile, dark rose said, ” brother Lu, please don’t misunderstand me. I was just testing you. Brother Lu, you’re indeed a gentleman. I’m impressed. Come on, let’s continue drinking!

“PAH!”

Lu Ming felt contempt in his heart. Testing?

If Lu Ming had not resisted the temptation just now, he would have lost his virginity.

“Come, drink!”

Naturally, Lu Ming would not show it on his face. He picked up his glass and drank with dark rose.

Next, it was time to chat.

by the way, Miss Rose, I heard that there’s a group of demon slaves in Magic City. I wonder where they’re being held? ”

Lu Ming asked calmly while drinking.

“Demon slave? They’re all locked up in the Colosseum!”

After being rejected by Lu Ming, night rose seemed to be a little absent-minded. She answered casually and did not think much about it.

“Animal arena? Beast fighting!”

Lu Ming’s heart was filled with cold killing intent, but he did not show it on his face.

Lu Ming controlled his temper and drank a few more glasses. He then found an excuse to leave.

“Then I won’t be sending you off, rose!”

Said night rose with a smile.

“No need to send me off!”

Lu Ming said and then left the place.

After watching Lu Ming leave, a ferocious look appeared on night Rose’s face. Her eyes were filled with greed. a third level celestial deity actually has such terrifying combat strength. It’s extremely rare. Furthermore, I can feel an incomparably exuberant life force. I must obtain it, I must obtain it!

“Lu Ming, you won’t be able to escape from me. Hehehe!”

The night rose let out a sharp laugh, which was extremely terrifying.

……

Lu Ming left the mansion of the night rose. He did not return to his room but left the city Lord’s mansion directly. He asked someone for the location of the animal arena and headed there directly.

His heart was burning with anxiety. He didn’t know how Qiu Yue, Wu Zifeng, and Yue Linglong were doing after so many days.

If anything happened to them, Lu Ming would flatten Magic City mountain.

The Colosseum was huge and was not far from the city Lord’s mansion. It was a huge building.

When Lu Ming neared the Colosseum, he heard a deafening roar coming from the Colosseum.

Lu Ming walked toward the main entrance of the animal arena.

There were guards at the entrance of the Colosseum, blocking Lu Ming.

“The entrance fee is a thousand mid grade God crystals!”

One of the burly men said coldly.

Lu Ming gave him a thousand mid-grade divine crystals and walked into the Colosseum.

As they walked into the Colosseum, the cheers became even more intense, wave after wave.
